txt.en:
'The Dunlendings have recently begun wielding weapons that are not of their own make, perhaps in response to the shortage of spears you have inflicted upon them.

'These terrible weapons have edges that are barbed and jagged and inflict terrible wounds upon their victims. Will you enter Brôntrig and try to capture some of these weapons for me to examine?

'Brôntrig lies just to the east of here.'
'Do you see, [placeholder]? These weapons are of a cruel design. The swords are serrated and the spears barbed... whoever made these delights in maiming their victims.'
Answith reports that the Dunlendings have begun wielding vicious weapons that inflict terrible damage upon their victims.
The strange weapons Answith spoke of may be found on the Dunlendings who dwell at Brôntrig.\n\nAnswith has asked you to recover the strange weapons from the Dunlendings at Brôntrig.
Bring the strange weapons to Answith in the Isendale
Answith is encamped near the tower west of Brôntrig.\n\nYou should bring the weapons you recovered to Answith.
